Model

Interface ITravels

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Travels

    public interface ITravels
    The Travel interface is responsible for all functions related to traveling queries. This interface is abstract enough so that its implementations can vary in design.
    Author:
    Octavio Maia

    • Method Summary

      • travelsBetweenDates

        java.util.List<Travel> travelsBetweenDates(java.time.LocalDateTime d1,
                                           java.time.LocalDateTime d2)
        Lists the Travels between two LocalDateTime.
        Parameters:
        d1 - Starting LocalDateTime.
        d2 - Ending LocalDateTime.
        Returns:
        List containing all the Travels between the two given LocalDateTime.

      • read

        int read(java.lang.String s)
        Parses the given string, adding the textual represented travels.
        Parameters:
        s - String received via the input.
        Returns:
        Integer representing the number of travels read.
